Interface ServiceDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
ServiceDAOPostgres
public interface ServiceDAO
Interface for performing data access operations related to services. Provides methods for creating, updating, deleting, and fetching services.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Service
    createService(int id_user_owner, String name, String example_image, float price, String description, int nb_buyers)
    Creates a new service in the database.
    boolean
    deleteService(int id_service)
    Deletes a service from the database.
    List<Service>
    getAllServices(int id_user_owner)
    Fetches all services owned by a user.
    Service
    getService(int serviceId)
    Fetches a service by its ID.
    Service
    updateService(int id_service, String name, String example_image, float price, String description)
    Updates an existing service in the database.

  • Method Details

    • createService

      Service createService(int id_user_owner, String name, String example_image, float price, String description, int nb_buyers)
      Creates a new service in the database.
      Parameters:
      id_user_owner - The ID of the user who owns the service.
      name - The name of the service.
      example_image - The URL of an example image for the service.
      price - The price of the service.
      description - The description of the service.
      nb_buyers - The number of buyers who have purchased the service.
      Returns:
      The created service, or `null` if the operation failed.

    • deleteService

      boolean deleteService(int id_service)
      Deletes a service from the database.
      Parameters:
      id_service - The ID of the service to delete.
      Returns:
      `true` if the service was successfully deleted, `false` otherwise.

    • updateService

      Service updateService(int id_service, String name, String example_image, float price, String description)
      Updates an existing service in the database.
      Parameters:
      id_service - The ID of the service to update.
      name - The new name of the service.
      example_image - The new URL of an example image for the service.
      price - The new price of the service.
      description - The new description of the service.
      Returns:
      The updated service, or `null` if the operation failed.

    • getAllServices

      List<Service> getAllServices(int id_user_owner)
      Fetches all services owned by a user.
      Parameters:
      id_user_owner - The ID of the user who owns the services.
      Returns:
      A list of services owned by the user.

    • getService

      Service getService(int serviceId)
      Fetches a service by its ID.
      Parameters:
      serviceId - The ID of the service to fetch.
      Returns:
      The service with the given ID, or `null` if no such service exists.
